statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, customer_name, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating ASC, date_submitted DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_name DESC, rating ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY date_submitted ASC, rating DESC
SELECT customer_name, date_submitted FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date_submitted ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerExperience ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM CustomerExperience WHERE feedback_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM CustomerExperience WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN CustomerExperience ON CustomerFeedback.feedback_id = CustomerExperience.feedback_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_profile ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM feedback_rating WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT c.full_name, f.rating FROM customer_profile c JOIN feedback_rating f ON c.customer_id = f.feedback_id;
SELECT c.full_name, f.rating FROM customer_profile c JOIN feedback_rating f ON c.customer_id = f.feedback_id WHERE f.rating > 3 ORDER BY c.full_name ASC;

SELECT c.full_name, c.email, fr.rating FROM customer_profile c LEFT JOIN (SELECT feedback_id, AVG(rating) AS rating FROM feedback_rating GROUP BY feedback_id) fr ON c.customer_id = fr.feedback_id ORDER BY fr.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'electronics' ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profile WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT history_text, timestamp FROM feedback_history WHERE feedback_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profile WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback JOIN customer_profile ON customer_feedback.customer_id = customer_profile.customer_id WHERE customer_profile.country = 'Canada';

SELECT category_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM feedback_categories JOIN customer_preferences ON feedback_categories.category_id = customer_preferences.category_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_profile JOIN customer_feedback ON customer_profile.customer_id = customer_feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
